articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Instagram’s latest feature lets you go back to see your watched Reels - TechCrunch
articles.description: With this new feature, users can go back and find videos they might not have had the chance to save.
articles.content: Instagram announced on Friday that it will now let you go back and see your previously watched Reels thanks to a new “Watch History” feature. Rival TikTok has had a Watch History feature for a few ye… [+1787 chars]
